title: No snow map
body: Hey, I am from EUNE and I cant see snowmap in my ranked/flex games.. just refular map. Is it possible that this is some non-patched bug on my side? Or is it problem on RIOT side?

replies.body: I think the Snowdown map is not available in ranked games to prevent any issues or confusion with clarity.  You should find it in normal games!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=4AVW98lQ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-12-16T00:24:08.578+0000)
>
> I think the Snowdown map is not available in ranked games to prevent any issues or confusion with clarity.  You should find it in normal games!

Yeah, ty.. too bad we dont have normals.. we have just blind pick which is jsut stupid game mod.
The snow map is not available in ranked games. It's only available in Co-op vs. AI and normal games.

> [{quoted}](name=Zombiemaster,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=4AVW98lQ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-15T22:19:46.559+0000)
>
> The snow map is not available in ranked games. It's only available in Co-op vs. AI and normal games.

Well.. no normal for EUNE.. and the rest  of the world.. GJ RIOT, ty
